detail_desc: Fleece duffle coat with a detachable, pile-lined hood, patch front pockets, toggles at the front and a yoke at the back. Pile lining.
Fleece duffle coat with a detachable, pile-lined hood, patch front pockets, toggles at the front and a yoke at the back. Pile lining.

Dungarees in cotton corduroy with press-studs at the sides, adjustable straps with press-studs at the front, and side and back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 3-12M.
Running trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Mesh-lined, zipped side pockets, jersey sections at the hems, and reflective details.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with soft, wide jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted fake back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in a linen weave with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Shorts woven in a viscose blend with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats at the top, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and short legs. Unlined.

Shorts woven in a viscose blend with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats at the top, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and short legs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt dress in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shirt dress in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shirt dress in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shirt dress in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Glittery trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Glittery trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a shirt and slipover in cotton. Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap. Fine-knit slipover with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.

Set with a shirt and slipover in cotton. Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap. Fine-knit slipover with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Long, padded jacket in nylon with a detachable, lined hood and small stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Checked coat in felted fabric containing some wool with a round collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and a pleat at the back. Lined.
Soft faux fur jacket with a lined hood with ear-shaped appliqués. Press-stud fastening and patch pockets at the front. Lined.
Soft faux fur jacket with a lined hood with ear-shaped appliqués. Press-stud fastening and patch pockets at the front. Lined.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, two-way zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and two inner pockets. Lined.

Windproof jacket in water-repellent, functional fabric with a  hood with a peak and a fleece-lined collar, and an adjustable drawstring at the front and top. Taped zip down the front, chest pockets with a taped zip, zipped side pockets, a discreet back pocket with a zip and an inner pocket in mesh. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, a drawstring at the hem, tape-trimmed inner seams, and reflective details.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightweight jacket in woven fabric with jersey sections front, back and on the sleeves and a mesh-lined hood. Ventilating mesh sections at the sides and underside of the sleeves, zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Partly lined in fleece.

Lightweight jacket in woven fabric with jersey sections front, back and on the sleeves and a mesh-lined hood. Ventilating mesh sections at the sides and underside of the sleeves, zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Partly lined in fleece.

Set with a double-layered hairband and triangular scarf in soft jersey. Patterned hairband with a knot detail at the front. Scarf with a print motif on one side and press-studs at the back of the neck.
Suede mules with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered wedge heels 4 cm.
Suede mules with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered wedge heels 4 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft linen jersey with a V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist, decorative seam at the front and a slit at the hem.
Loose-fitting vest top in linen slub jersey with a deep neckline. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Loose-fitting vest top in linen slub jersey with a deep neckline. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in sturdy wool-blend twill with a zip and concealed button at the back and straight legs with sewn-in creases.
Trousers in stretch, striped twill made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs that finish at the ankles.

One-button, velvet jacket with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Patterned lining. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft fleece.
Straight-cut double-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut double-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Joggers in soft velour with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Scarf in a soft, patterned weave with short fringes along the sides. Size 120x190 cm.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Parka in a patterned cotton weave with a lined, drawstring hood, partially concealed press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Unlined.
Jacket in soft velour with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Asymmetric skirt in a stretch weave with a high waist with belt loops, press-studs down the front and an opening at the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and a front pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and buttons at the back of the neck.
Dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and buttons at the back of the neck.
Round-neck jumper in a sturdy, fine knit with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-neck jumper in a sturdy, fine knit with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-neck jumper in a sturdy, fine knit with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine knit with a soft pile lining, hood with ears on the top, and buttons down the front.
Hat in braided paper straw with a raw edge. Width of brim approx. 12 cm.
Short lace dress with long sleeves, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a raw-edge, scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slits in the sides.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slits in the sides.
